# [Interview #981: JordanCon 2013 - Q&A with Maria, Entry #24](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=981#24)

#### Terez

What happened to Liandrin after Suroth got arrested? She had that crazy shield on her, you know, so she was conspicuous.

#### Maria Simons

I'd like to know that too. Some things occasionally get overlooked...
